description:
In the Mifos X Web App,  after clicking on cancel button "Required Field" get populated in the particular page in several sections including Create Office page, Create Holiday page, and Create Savings Product page. Required Field should not get populated. Please see https://github.com/openMF/community-app/issues/1655 for full details.
You can test this out at https://demo.openmf.org ( mifos / password ). This can be changed by updating the Mifos X Web App (Community App) with source code located at https://github.com/openMF/community-app. Please reference this Getting Started Guide  ( https://goo.gl/Un9ZCy ) to familiarize with the codebase.
name: Mifos X Web App - Fix Issue Whereby Required Field Gets Populated After Cancel Button Is Clicked
